title: Hydration and Performance: How Water Impacts Your Workouts
description: Water is more than just a thirst quencherâ€”it plays a direct role in exercise performance. Learn how to stay properly hydrated for better strength, endurance, and recovery.

sections.title: Why Hydration Is Crucial
sections.content: Water regulates body temperature, lubricates joints, and helps transport nutrients. Even mild dehydration can impair performance and cause fatigue.

sections.title: Hydration Strategies for Athletes
sections.content: Drink water consistently throughout the day, not just before workouts. For long or intense sessions, electrolyte drinks can help replace lost sodium and potassium.
